Intro.resume:
Highly motivated upcoming IT engineer. Preparing a master degree doing work-study program and experienced in mobile cross-platform development.
      Strong/Solid knowledge of Angular, Ionic, HTML, CSS and Typescript. Skilled in backend Firebase API development.
      Quick and curious learner, team player aiming to confirm his skills and pursue career as a developer.
      Looking for a 12 weeks international internship starting on July 15 2024.
Intro.presentation:
I'm a 21 years old student preparing a master degree on a work-study programm. Passionate about computers since I first used a computer,I decided to do my first internship in the world of development at the age of 14. I have completed various small personnal computer
    projects out of curiousity and as a hobbys.
Intro.goals: My professional goals are to continue improving my skills as a mobile and web application developer. Eventually, when I have enough experience, I would like to become a project manager to lead teams.

Interests.title: My interests
Interests.sportDescription: I am passionate about sports, particularly basketball. I used to play in a team for 12 years and I also love watching the NBA. I love sports in general, I enjoy running and riding bike a lot. I started working out 3 yearss ago.
Interests.musicDescription: I have been playing music since I was 5 years old. I started with piano but I quickly switched to the guitar. I practice in a band and by myself.
Interests.ITDescription: I am passionate about computer science, and I enjoy creating small projects such as:
Interests.example1: Setting up OpenMediaVault on a Raspberry Pi for creating a Samba share.
Interests.example3: Installing a Minecraft server on a Raspberry Pi.
